Snippet.Code: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <Project xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/developer/msbuild/2003"> <UsingTask AssemblyName="MbUnit.MSBuild.Tasks" TaskName="MbUnit.MSBuild.Tasks.MbUnit"/> <ItemGroup> <TestAssemblies Include="$end$" /> </ItemGroup> <Target Name="Tests"> <MbUnit Assemblies ="@(TestAssemblies)" HaltOnFailure="false" ReportTypes="Xml;Text;Html;Dox" ReportFileNameFormat="mbunit-{0}-{1}" /> </Target> </Project>
